name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 15, Yancheng, Jiangsu. It was revealed online that several dogs were imprisoned and bred in a dog farm in Funing County. To prevent nuisance to the public, the owner of the dog farm cruelly cut off their vocal cords.
Volunteers then called the police and rescued the dogs
Staff at the Dongfeng Police Station of the Funing County Public Security Bureau said: We will investigate and verify the police report after receiving it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a special convoy appeared on the streets of Xinxiang, Henan Province. Traffic police blocked the road, police cars led the way, and ambulances escorted the vehicles. All the windows were covered for unknown reasons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Nanjing Metro Supplement

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, a video of "Ten Questions for the Red Army" went viral on the Chinese Internet. In the video, Red Army soldiers asked, "Are the people in charge?" "Are there still people who are bullying the people?" "Does the Party still remember our promises to the people?" "When someone needs to stand up, will anyone stand up?" etc. Netizens said that "every sentence is heartbreaking."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is reported that the video was taken from the narrative drama "From Xiangjiang to Zunyi" created and rehearsed by the Drama Troupe of the Political Work Department of the Military Commission and the Publicity Department of the CPC Chengdu Municipal Committee in 2017.
There are rumors that the play was suspended after the premiere, but some people also said that the play is still being performed to this day, and no information source has been found that the screenwriter or creative team has been dealt with.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A few hours after I sent out this tweet, the Chinese government website displayed some "selected comments", and then netizens continued to complain in the forwarding area

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, Shandong Yantai suffered a heavy snowstorm. In previous years, the city center area had fixed snow-clearing sanitation workers. This year, because the government had no money, it sent a WeChat public account in the evening to call on citizens and outsourcing companies to clear snow. As a result, an outsourcing company employee complained that they had not received subsidies for three years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 17, Maimai announced that the housing fund for all employees would be reduced to 5%, and the company would cancel free meals and subsidies for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 2 pm on December 17, Xinchang Town, Pudong New District, Shanghai, was protesting against a proposed landfill site surrounded by residential buildings, business districts, primary schools, kindergartens, rivers and farmland. On that day, residents went to the local petition office to protest and shouted "Serve the people" to the police on the scene. Afterwards, the police entered the scene to arrest people, and a dispute broke out.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, the media reported that the minimum standard of basic pension for Shandong residents was raised from 160 yuan per person per month to 168 yuan. Netizens mocked: 160 yuan is already too much to spend, and now there is 8 yuan left.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/ttkQxylnmH

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 16, Haikou City. A netizen took a photo of a ragged man kneeling on the ground and kowtowed on the road.
A local netizen in the comment area said that he can see him like this every day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Adults collapse in an instant'
In the early morning of December 16, in Guangdong, a netizen took a photo of a scrap collector downstairs dragging the scrap he had picked up, and suddenly sat on the ground and started crying loudly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Snow in Yantai
On December 16, a sudden snowstorm hit Yantai, Shandong, creating a real-life version of "The Wandering Earth". That night, the Yantai Meteorological Bureau issued a yellow warning for heavy snow, with the maximum snow depth in the area being 12 centimeters. The snow made it difficult for pedestrians and vehicles to move, and deliverymen had to deliver food on foot. Some netizens joked that opening the door was like teleporting to Siberia. In some communities, the snow was more than knee-deep.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Owners of a residential complex in Wuhan united to evict the property management company, and the two sides entered into a confrontation
On December 16, the property management company of Wuhan Zhengshang Jinyu Shijia was replaced, but the original property management company refused to leave, so the owners gathered together to forcibly evict the old property management company. During this period, fierce conflicts and shoving broke out between the owners and the property management company. Everyone used fire extinguishers to spray the property management committee, and a security guard was suspected to be injured and fell to the ground in the conflict.
In the early morning of December 17, the old property management company pulled a whole bus of security guards, rushed into the community, dismantled the gate, and insulted the owners who were defending their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 16, Guangxi. Liuzhou City's Longing Financial Company illegally raised funds to defraud the elderly of their retirement money, and has not filed a case so far. Almost every month, an elderly person dies of depression or jumps off a building because of this case.
On that day, a large number of victimized elderly people held banners in front of the local court and shouted slogans such as "Support the Communist Party, Support Mao Zedong, Support Xi Jinping" to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 17, Guangdong.
A man posted a video saying that not giving birth to a child here is the greatest love for the child. If you can get out, you must live a better life in this world. Dad loves you and will never let you be born in this land.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 15, Beijing.
A man posted a video saying that he was a second-class non-commissioned officer and a retired soldier. He was illegally detained for 266 days by the Public Security Bureau of Mangkam County, Qamdo City, Tibet, and was threatened and abused by the political commissar and extorted by the police. When he went to Beijing to petition, he was followed by two unidentified plainclothes officers. When he asked them why they were following him, the two plainclothes officers invited the man to have a meal together.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 16, Hangzhou, Zhejiang.
At the ACG Attack on Titan concert, the audience questioned the poor performance of the band and the sound and instruments were not on the same channel. Then the angry audience shouted for a refund on the spot.

content:
Fireworks again?
December 16, Hebei. A video shot by a netizen showed that a family set off fireworks at night, and the police rushed into the house to arrest people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Wuhan Metro Contribution

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up of the protest in Xinchang Town, Shanghai At 8pm, the local government decided to suspend the construction of the garbage dump, and the people's struggle was successful. Three people were arrested at the scene, one was released, and the other was a couple with two children under the age of 3. The children were left unattended. The people demanded that they be released, and then they had a scuffle with the police, and an elderly person was pushed down in the middle. Afterwards, the people's representatives announced that the local government had decided to suspend the construction of the garbage dump for the time being, and would communicate about the re-location issue next. However, they could not provide a signed certificate because civil servants (leaders) have a sense of self-protection, so everyone should understand. Afterwards, the masses were still dissatisfied and demanded the release of the people, saying, "Civil servants need to protect us, the people, don't they?" The representatives said that the three of them would communicate with the police to release the people, and called on everyone to go home first. Finally, the crowd slowly left and dispersed amid doubts.

Netizen contribution
Shijiazhuang is ranked last in air quality, so companies are required to stop production, causing hundreds of workers in the factory to have trouble keeping warm.
